page.title: 07HINCHLEY WOOD HOSPITAL PLAN
page.content: { Village Homes Ltd}want to build a 56 bed private hospital for the elderly on{9.6 acres}of the{College of Estate {Management}land in{Manor Road South, {Hinchley Wood.}It would be a bungalow style building costing about{Â£2.5m. Treatment would be for in and out patients.{Planning permission}has been agreed for a 30 bed hospital but re- jected for a 40 bed hospital.{Hinchley {Wood Residents Assocation}want the council to buy{C.E.M.}land to be used as a public Sports centre and open space.Hinchley Wood R.A have{8 000 {voters. If a sports centre was built there would be lots of activities.I do not go to{Leatherhead Sports Centre}be_ cause it is so far away.There are not many facilities for sport in Claygate. The land should be kept as part of the open space of{Telegraph Hill.
